body: Glad to see part 2 of mogiki hayami's Milf Series is up and running

Pg 61 Mikami Cannon’s NTR was interesting. Father and guy’s first girlfriend he made in college are cheating. Usual NTR stuff, condomless, she’s more turned on with his father than him. He then goes to her to have sex with her, and asks her if she likes him. She goes “eh all of a sudden, of course I like you.” Or to that effect. And while she’s saying that, in the black text boxes he’s thinking “is that true, how do you feel saying that, do you feel guilty, and how can I make you feel the same pain I’m feeling.” It was interesting ending.
